name: University of Nevada, Las Vegas (UNLV)
address: 4505 S. Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89154

residenceHalls.name: Dayton Complex
residenceHalls.description: Suite-style bathrooms, fully furnished, first-year focused
residenceHalls.vendingPriority: TOP - First-year students, highest impulse buying

residenceHalls.name: Tonopah Complex
residenceHalls.description: Suite-style bathrooms, fully furnished, first-year focused
residenceHalls.vendingPriority: TOP - Same as Dayton, high first-year population

residenceHalls.name: Upper Classmen Complex (UCC)
residenceHalls.vendingPriority: HIGH - Has kitchen but convenience/snack demand still strong

affiliatedHousing.name: The Degree (U District)
affiliatedHousing.notes: Separately operated — pitch U District management directly

affiliatedHousing.name: Legacy LV (U District)
affiliatedHousing.notes: Separately operated — pitch U District management directly

housing.address: Mail Stop 2013, 4505 S. Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89154

purchasing.notes: Vendor registration required through NSHE SReg at suppliers.nevada.edu

facilities.notes: Manages ~3.9M sq ft, online service request portal

studentGovernment.name: CSUN (Consolidated Students of UNLV)
studentGovernment.address: Mail Stop 2009, 4505 S. Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89154
studentGovernment.notes: Budget includes $481K sponsorships, $614K student org funding. Get student senators to champion smart vending initiative.

dining.provider: Third-party food service (likely Aramark — needs confirmation)
dining.gap: Dining halls close in evening — vending fills late-night demand

procurement.process: Register in SReg → Contact Purchasing → Propose pilot or respond to RFP

nextAction: Register as NSHE vendor, then email housing@unlv.edu with pilot proposal
notes: THE WHALE. 32,911 students, 4 residence halls, Top 5 most diverse university. First-year housing requirement means dorms are FULL. Target Dayton Complex for pilot. Get CSUN student government buy-in as a parallel strategy.

name: College of Southern Nevada (CSN)

campuses.name: Charleston Campus
campuses.address: 6375 W. Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89146

campuses.name: North Las Vegas Campus
campuses.address: 3200 E. Cheyenne Ave, North Las Vegas, NV 89030

campuses.name: Henderson Campus
campuses.notes: Growing campus, Henderson area overlap with Kandé territory

purchasing.address: Sort Code NLVF110, 3200 E. Cheyenne Ave, North Las Vegas, NV 89030

staff.name: Rolando Mosqueda, J.D.
staff.title: Associate Vice President, Procurement & Auxiliary Services
staff.priority: PRIMARY CONTACT — oversees both procurement AND auxiliary services

procurement.notes: Uses NSHE SReg system. Contact Rolando Mosqueda directly for auxiliary services/vending.

nextAction: Call Rolando Mosqueda at 702-651-4245 — pitch campus amenity upgrade
notes: No dorms (commuter college) but 32,000 students across 3 campuses = massive grab-and-go traffic. Student unions and libraries are prime locations. Probably has OLD legacy vending machines ripe for replacement.

name: Nevada State University
onCampusResidents: Unknown — housing program exists (listed under Student Life)

procurement.notes: Has 'Doing Business with Nevada State' page — actively seeks vendors

studentGovernment.name: NSSA (Nevada State Student Alliance)
studentGovernment.notes: Student government — potential champion for smart vending

studentLife.notes: Food Pantry listed = food access is a concern = affordable vending options are a fit

procurement.notes: Same NSHE SReg registration as UNLV and CSN. Recently upgraded from 'college' to 'university' — expanding services.

opportunities: New university status — trying to build campus amenities to compete with UNLV
Growing student body — new infrastructure being built
Less bureaucracy than UNLV
Henderson location overlaps with Kandé's territory
Housing program = future dorm placements
Food Pantry presence = food access concern = affordable smart vending resonates
nextAction: Contact Finance & Business Operations, explore vendor process
notes: SLEEPER HIT. Recently became a university, rapidly growing, building new infrastructure. Get in early before they establish contracts. Henderson location is prime Kandé territory.

name: Touro University Nevada

general.notes: Private school — pitch directly to campus administration or facilities manager

opportunities: Graduate/professional students = higher spending per transaction
Medical students study 10-14 hour days = extreme snacking demand
No dorms but high campus presence hours
Smaller school = faster decision-making, less bureaucracy
Health-focused students = stock healthy options + energy drinks
Private school = no NSHE RFP requirements
nextAction: Visit campus in person, ask for facilities/operations manager
notes: Small but efficient target. Med/health students are on campus all day, spend more per transaction. Private school = fast decision timeline. Henderson location.

name: Roseman University of Health Sciences

campuses.name: Henderson Campus
campuses.notes: Main campus, dental clinic on-site (Roseman Dental & Orthodontics)

general.notes: Private school — pitch directly to administration

opportunities: TWO campuses (Henderson + Summerlin) = two placements
Medical/dental/pharmacy students = same long-hours pattern as Touro
Henderson campus has dental clinic = patients + students
Growing institution (recently added Medical and Vet programs)
20+ student organizations = potential campus champions
Private school = no NSHE bureaucracy
nextAction: Visit Henderson campus in person, pitch to facilities
notes: Two campuses, growing program portfolio, dental clinic adds patient traffic. Good second-tier target after UNLV and CSN.

name: U District (UNLV-Affiliated Housing)

general.notes: Separately managed from UNLV — approach property management directly

opportunities: 1,000-1,600 students across two properties
12-month leases (not just academic year) = year-round revenue
Separately managed = different (potentially easier) procurement
Commuter meal plans = students cook/snack more = vending demand
Luxury property (The Degree) = premium product pricing opportunity
nextAction: Contact U District property management through website
notes: UNLV-affiliated but independently operated. Easier to approach than UNLV directly. Good parallel track.
